column5: Signed up a few days ago,  I now have time to write up an intro  A little bit of myself, I'm 38 yrs old. Married and a 2.5 yrs old son. Moved to the GTA in 94. Hometown: Sudbury, born and raised  Currently living in Mississauga..  While growing up, did lots of fishing, from Salmon, Pike, Musky, Pickeral, Bass. Once became of age, started hunting with my Father.  regular stuff, grouse, rabitt..ducks. I was never able to go hunting with him and learn the hunt for either Moose, deer, caribou, Elk,,ect. I have the equipment: Bow and Shotgun, Rifle soon  Since 94, I've been looking for places to hunt with no success, either I get, "Get lost" or "Slamming the door", the most polite let down was "sorry" Been looking for places to hunt since then...  Signed up a few years ago for Wild Turkey, can't wait to give that a try.   So currenttly, I'm looking for a hunting/fishing partner. Hopefully leads to a friendship..  Later on, my goal is to get my son involved in hunting/fishing in all game...
Welcome to the site. Wish you luck with your gobler hunt.
Welcome to the board... there are a few of us hunters hanging around here

welcome......there used to be a good place to go for turkey, haven't been there in a few years, but wasn't on private property....have to look and see if it's still public...but worth the drive (about 1 1/2 hrs from Miss.)
Welcome aboard...tons and tons of ministry forests to hunt in....and some other places as well!

Welcome.Seen yer post before,was waiting for an intro. Lots of fishing guys and gals here,and a handful of hunters. I think once you have been around for awhile,you,ll have no problemos finding good friends to do both. BTW,Those turkeys at Irish,s place,they are spoken for.
Maybe Wayne (Irishfield) will invite you over for some back-porch gobbler hunting. Welcome to OFC Love2Hunt
Welcome to the board!  From your intro, it sounds like you'll fit right in!
Welcome to the board, look forward to your reports.
Hey Welcome to the board always looking for a bsssin partner in the summer months drop me a pm we can hook up somtime !!! BMM
thank you very much for the warm welcome  I will accept any offers.. and return them with offers of my own..  Thanks  looking forward in meeting with you
